name: Ball Rumble
description:
•Ball Rumble is an action survival game in which we as a black ball are on a high cliff with a lot of enemies that act  against us and tries to push us off the cliff.
•  We have to defend against the forces of the enemy balls and the boss balls that have their own skills and stay at the top of the cliff for the longest time possible and defeating more enemies at the same time.
•  The game will keep on increasing its difficulty level until and unless the player (black ball) falls off the cliff. The game begins with one enemy and after we defeat that enemy, in the next level the enemy count increases and keeps on doing that until the player loses. 
• Boss balls also spawn while you clear the levels of the game. They are bigger and stronger balls with their own special abilities.
